oldentry: Popular explanation: to take from your mind and put into others.
verblex: 1. To have an effect on the way that a person acts or on what happens. English = influence.
nomlex: 1. The effect that someone has on what a person does or on what happens. English = influence.
2. The power that you have which makes it likely that other people will agree with you or do what you want. English = influence.
